Title: First Thing We Do, Let's Kill All the Lawyers
Writer: Aaron Sorkin (created by), Aaron Sorkin (teleplay by), Ian Reichbach (story), Aaron Sorkin (story by), Ian Reichbach (executive story editor), Brendan Fehily (story editor), Michael Gunn (story editor), Corinne Kingsbury (story editor), Dana Ledoux Miller (story editor), Camilla Blackett (staff writer), Matthew Lopez (staff writer), Adam R. Perlman (staff writer)
Actors: Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill
Plot: A lawyer interviews Will McAvoy about an institutional failure at ACN related to a news story that has been proved inaccurate.
